thread.section_title: World Nomads Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of World Nomads | worldnomads.com
thread.title: Shukran

author: Shukran
title: Shukran
text:
I travel to the Middle East regularly for work and to visit my relatives. I never use to take travel insurance until I found out about World Nomads. There is so much noise on the compare websites - compare this compare that, they all look the same, but not World Nomads.
World Nomads has a holistic approach to its travelers - loads of information on where you're travelling to, easy to navigate purchase path and website, and clear follow ups.
I've used them a couple of times now and will continue to do so.
Shukran.
